description.message: It can save all the tabs in the current window and open them all at once, realize the flexible switching of multiple windows, and save up to 99% of the memory.

noResult.message: Please enter the group name first, and then click the "â†“" button to save the group

emptyGroupName.message: The group name cannot be empty

invalidGroupName.message: The group name is illegal, please modify it first

groupNameRepeat.message: Group name is not allowed to be repeated

changeConfirm.message: Are you sure to update the group

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure to delete the group

clearDataExplain.message: Only Group Data will be deleted, and the Preference Data will not be affected

exportExplain.message: Except for the Preference Data of this plug-in, the rest of the data (ie Group Data) is only saved locally. If you log in on other devices, you can export the data first and then import on other devices.

addKeysExplain.message: Quickly start the program, improve the efficiency of use

resetConfirm.message: Are you sure to restore the default configuration?

clearDataConfirm.message: Are you sure to delete Group Data?

invalidFileFormat.message: It is not a valid file format

settingImportMessage.message: The file is loaded successfully, click the "Store" button to take effect
